headline: Maestria Loads Up Shift4 Stock With 144,000 Shares Bought
summary: Shift4 Payments delivers integrated payment and business management solutions for merchants in stadiums, entertainment, and eCommerce.

headline: This week’s slump in asset-manager stocks was driven by private-credit fears. Here’s what’s worrying investors.
summary: Shares of asset managers fell due to worries over a private-credit fund managed by Blue Owl Capital, triggering broader anxiety about spillover effects.
